title: Pet's Heros
description: A transformative platform that allows users to report injured pets, connect with volunteers and veterinarians, and streamline adoption. It ensures efficient management of pet rescue, care, and adoption life cycle

title: Flavor Finder
description: Displays a wide variety of recipes with details on ingredients, cuisines, and dietary preferences, allowing users to search and filter easily.

title: E-commerce API
description: It offers secure JWT-based authentication, product browsing, cart and purchase management. Admins can perform CRUD operations on products, manage users, and monitor payments for a streamlined and secure experience.

title: Sweet Tooth
description: A fast-paced game where you catch candy and cake while dodging fiery chillies using keyboard controls. Built with plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a fun and responsive gameplay experience.

title: Notes React
description: A React-based notes app built using MUI for a clean UI. Notes are stored in local storage with timestamps for easy organization.

title: Hospital Management
description: It  streamlines healthcare tasks by allowing admins to manage doctors, users to book appointments, and doctors to track their schedules efficiently.

title: Notes Valut
description: A sleek and user-friendly note-taking app that stores notes in local storage. Includes timestamps for easy tracking and organization.
